item.title: Daily occurrence, 16th November
item.description:

item.title: Deep ~30cm pothole A214 Westbound, 16th November
item.description:
Large pothole on A214 Westbound, just past Ryecroft Road bus stop (CU). On left of carriageway so cyclists required to move right to avoid it, creating possibly unsafe situation. Some car drivers also avoid it. Damage to vehicles likely soon as it continues to deepen and expand.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crown Lane, Upper Norwood, London Borough of Croydon
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Bike Frame attached to Lampost near 33 Somerfield road, 16th November
item.description:
This bike frame has been there for many months despite the owner reporting in June that it had been stripped and the lock broken meaning that he couldn't remove it. It is a dangerous highway obstruction and needs to be removed.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wilberforce Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Street cleaning, 16th November
item.description:
--- I would like to request street cleaning for Church Road. It often feels as though our street is overlooked, and unless we carry out the litter picking, it does not get cleaned. At the moment, there is a significant amount of rubbish scattered around, including a black bin bag left at the end of the road, general litter and leaves. I also rarely see council cleaning staff on our street. Could you please arrange for Church Road to be cleaned and included in a regular cleaning schedule? It would greatly improve the appearance and safety of our area. Thank you for your attention to this matter. Kind regards, --- If you'd like, I can adjust the tone (more formal, more urgent, more friendly) or add details.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Northumberland Heath, Erith, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet
